description: 共同科英文（二）課程為一學期兩學分課程，係為非英語系學生所開設的課程。目標在幫助大一學生活用中學時期所累積的英語知識，提昇英語聽、說、讀、寫整體的溝通能力。為達此目標，本課程要求教師盡量用英語上課，努力營造一個豐富的英語環境，讓學生不但有充分機會以英語參與課堂活動，且樂於使用英語與同學及老師溝通。
goals: 1. 增進學生英語溝通表達能力 2. 透過參與課程活動促進團隊精神 3. 透過多面向英語閱讀促使學生了解多元文化，拓展學生國際化視野 4. 透過課堂討論培養批判精神 5. 提升學生英語學習動機及自主學習興趣

COURSE DESCRIPTION

This course aims to develop student’s English proficiency regarding all four language skills. Students are expected to increase their reading and writing literacy along with listening comprehension and communication competence through a variety of in-class and out-of-class activities.

ENGLISH SONG PRESENTATION (50% English, 50% Chinese)

*   Presenters (3-4 people in one group)

      Before your presentation, you have to …

1.  design an activity, with a handout (A5, 3 new words, 2 idiom/phrase)
2.  prepare 5 questions for a quiz in class, and
3.  turn in the handout a week before your presentation.

       During the presentation, **_every_** group member has to (1) be on stage, (2) present/explain the song, and (3) answer your classmates’           questions.

DUBBING (English Only)

*   Presenters (3-4 people in a group)

Before your performance, you have to…

1.  find an English clip (4-5 minutes)
2.  watch the clip, listen and repeat what is said in the video, and

     During the presentation, **_each_** group member has to (1) be on stage, (2) play the video with the sound off, and (3) take turns to dub your  voice into the video.

LEXILE

*   You are very encouraged to read the book at your own pace, according to your own schedule.

     Journal 1: Your schedule for reading this book

*   How many chapters do you plan to read?
*   How do you plan to read the book? (for example, one chapter a week, a month)
*   How do you plan to use the book to improve your English?
*   Is there any other material related to the book (movies, cartoons)?

       Journal 2: The difficulties you have faced so far

       Journal 3: The achievement you have made

*   How much have you read?
*   How do you like the book?
*   What have you learned from the book?
*   How are you going to finish the rest of the book?
